title: Puffed rice instant cereal Recipe for Babies - Travel Food for Babies
content:
Puffed Rice Instant Cereal for Babies. Highly Nutritious and Protein-rich porridge mix for babies. This is an instant cereal recipe which is great for travel too.

This recipe is a healthy protein cereal mix for baby. It has puffed rice and roasted gram dal which helps in weight gaining in babies. Puffed rice cereal is rich in protein and carb. You can feed this to babies above 6 months.

 

Puffed Rice Instant Cereal for Babies

 

Prep time

5 mins

 

Total time

5 mins

 

Serves: 1 cup

 

Ingredients

FOR INSTANT CEREAL:

Puffed Rice - 1.5 cup

Roasted Gram Dal (Pori Kadalai) - ½ cup

 

FOR MAKING PORRIDGE:

Puffed Rice Cereal Mix - ¼ cup

Hot Water - ¼ cup or as needed

Roasted Cumin Powder & Salt to taste

or

Jaggery Syrup or any sweetner to taste

 

Instructions

Take both ingredients in a blender and powder fine. Store in a container.

For making porridge, take the mix in a bowl, add hot water, cumin powder and salt and mix well. You can add sweetner to make a sweet porridge too.

Feed your baby.
